description:
Figs T1, T2 and T3 of LBI TPO (NO.225) 2001
Remove basal growth
Prune to clear property by up to 1m
Prune to clear street light by up to 1m
Prune back to the previous points of reduction to clear the highway
Lift to clear footpath and all round
Crown thin the remainder of the crown by up to 15% and remove deadwood
Prune back from the corner of the staff room to give 2.5m clearance to allow bike rack installation.

Remove basal growth
Prune to clear property by up to 1m, Prune to clear street lights by 0.5m
Prune back to the previous points of reduction on the roadside to clear the highway and to reduce lever -arm.
Lift to clear footpath
Crown thin by up to 15% and remove deadwood
Prune back from the corner of the staff room to give 2.5m clearance to facilitate the installation of a bike rack
site_name: Clerkenwell Parochial Church Of England Primary School
